answer.text: Selective medium only certain types of bacteria that can live while differentiation medium is used to distinguish one type of bacteria from another
Selective media can grow bacteria in general, whereas only certain types of differentiation media can live
Selective medium contains certain chemical substances while differentiation medium uses natural ingredients
Differentiation medium is used to grow bacteria while selective medium is used to grow bacteria in general
The selective medium is always a solid while the differentiation medium is a liquid
